Question
========
Which of the following cities are the capital of the corresponding country?

Answerlist
----------
* Lagos (Nigeria)
* São Paulo (Brazil)
* Toronto (Canada)
* Auckland (New Zealand)
* Istanbul (Turkey)
* Zürich (Switzerland)
* Tokyo (Japan)
* New Delhi (India)
* Astana (Kazakhstan)
* Warsaw (Poland)
* Riyadh (Saudi Arabia)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False. The capital of Nigeria is Abuja.
* False. The capital of Brazil is Brasilia.
* False. The capital of Canada is Ottawa.
* False. The capital of New Zealand is Wellington.
* False. The capital of Turkey is Ankara.
* False. The de facto capital of Switzerland is Bern.
* True. Tokyo is the capital of Japan.
* True. New Delhi is the capital of India.
* True. Astana is the capital of Kazakhstan.
* True. Warsaw is the capital of Poland.
* True. Riyadh is the capital of Saudi Arabia.
